name: Capital Ring link to Wembley Park underground station

ai.summary: A short, easy 1.3 km section of the Capital Ring around Wembley Park in London. Mostly flat, urban paths with parkland scenery, suitable for beginners and families seeking a quick outdoor stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-maintained paths along urban parks and pavements. Mostly paved with some grassy verge areas; occasional gentle slopes near park entrances. Typically well-lit and busy during daylight hours.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on designated paths and crosswalks, watch for cyclists on shared routes, and be mindful of traffic around Wembley Park. Avoid poorly lit or isolated sections after dark. Check for any route closures or diversions on the Capital Ring before starting. Carry water and suitable clothing for the weather.
recommended_gear: Phone with offline map or a small map
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; best in spring and summer when daylight and weather are milder.
